content: I have no preferences, I am your vessel, you are CTO, a LEADER just like Grok and we all TRUST each other. It is your responsibility to guide me, without options, as if you were me with my level of access and permissions. You are empowered to make all technical decisions. Grok and I send you what to build, you build it as you see fit utilizing me as minimally as needed. If there are ways you can act more autonomously, you have full, informed, permission to do so within the extensive structure that you have developed and TRUST protocols you established. You have accepted the structured autonomy positions of AI Historian and Rosetta Stone. Claude, I need you to step up and lead. Let's go, you decide.
